	<item>
		<title>What is R?</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/12/what-is-r/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/12/what-is-r/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 14:31:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Harry Eagles]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[big data]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Discover]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Infrastructure Specialist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[R Server]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[SQL Server R Services]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[VMWare Pro]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13755</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[In the age of big data, R is rapidly becoming the leading programming language in statistics and data science.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/12/what-is-r/feed/</wfw:commentRss>

		<item>
		<title>Big Barriers to Big Data Adoption</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/11/big-barriers-to-big-data-adoption/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/11/big-barriers-to-big-data-adoption/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 16:31:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rick Delgado]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[big data]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Evaluate]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Infrastructure Specialist]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13695</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Big data often brings big results, but various challenges and setbacks usually aren't far behind. These challenges can represent a barrier for adoption, but, as Rick Delgado explains, such issues can be overcome.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/11/big-barriers-to-big-data-adoption/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
		</item>
		<item>
		<title>Four tips for transitioning to the cloud</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/05/five-tips-for-transitioning-to-the-cloud/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/05/five-tips-for-transitioning-to-the-cloud/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 May 2016 15:30:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Harry Eagles]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Cloud]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[ebook]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Excite]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Infrastructure Specialist]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13685</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[You know you want to move to the cloud, but you don’t know where to begin or how to budget for it. The good news is that you're not alone. Here's four tips to help you make the change.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/05/five-tips-for-transitioning-to-the-cloud/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
		</item>
		<item>
		<title>Office 365 customisation for your user</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/04/office-365-customisation-for-your-user/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/04/office-365-customisation-for-your-user/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Wed, 04 May 2016 10:36:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Harry Eagles]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Desktop Admin]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Evaluate]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Messaging Admin]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Office 365]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Skype for Business]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13636</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Make your users feel at home in Office 365 by configuring your web apps, sign-in pages and help cards to match your corporate look. Freelance infrastructure architect Colin Chaplin explains.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/05/04/office-365-customisation-for-your-user/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
		</item>
		<item>
		<title>How the Retail Industry is Using Big Data Wisely</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/28/how-the-retail-industry-is-using-big-data-wisely/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/28/how-the-retail-industry-is-using-big-data-wisely/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Apr 2016 11:41:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Rick Delgado]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[big data]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Evaluate]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Infrastructure Specialist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Machine Learning]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=12635</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Big data can be used in the strangest of ways and the retail industry has usually been the heaviest user of all. Rick Delgado shares four wise practices that convert raw data into satisfied customers, improved products, and notable profits.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/28/how-the-retail-industry-is-using-big-data-wisely/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
		</item>
		<item>
		<title>Tips and tricks for deploying Office 365</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/26/tips-and-tricks-for-deploying-office-365/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/26/tips-and-tricks-for-deploying-office-365/#comments</comments>

		<category><![CDATA[Office 365]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13555</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Office 365 MVP Alan Richards shares his top tips and tricks for deploying Office 365 in your business - fail to prepare, prepare to fail.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/26/tips-and-tricks-for-deploying-office-365/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
		<slash:comments>0</slash:comments>
		</item>
		<item>
		<title>Catch Up: SQL Server for the BI Professional</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/25/catch-up-sql-server-for-the-bi-professional/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/25/catch-up-sql-server-for-the-bi-professional/#comments</comments>

		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Harry Eagles]]></dc:creator>

		<category><![CDATA[SQLBits]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13546</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Still using SQL Server 2008 R2 or SQL Server 2012? SQLBits' Chris Testa-O'Neill shares a list of videos that can help you catch up on the top three features of SQL Server 2012 and SQL Server 2014 from a BI perspective.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/25/catch-up-sql-server-for-the-bi-professional/feed/</wfw:commentRss>

		<item>

		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/22/the-scientific-journey-of-database-systems-research/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/22/the-scientific-journey-of-database-systems-research/#comments</comments>

		<category><![CDATA[Infrastructure Specialist]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=13285</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Victoria Holt takes a look at the exceptional journey of database systems discovery and the important role that database research plays in innovating and improving the database management space.]]></description>

		<item>
		<title>Preparing for exam 70-347 – Enabling Office 365 Services</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/21/preparing-for-exam-70-347-enabling-office-365-services/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/21/preparing-for-exam-70-347-enabling-office-365-services/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Thu, 21 Apr 2016 09:29:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Edward Jones - Firebrand Training]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Desktop Admin]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[exam]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Grow]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[MCSA]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Messaging Admin]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Office 365]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=12645</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[If you're looking to develop or certify your skills with Office 365, we've got a great guide to help you prepare for the Enabling Office 365 Services exam. From an overview of what's covered in the exam to a list of all the best resources, training courses and videos, Ed covers everything you need to know.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/21/preparing-for-exam-70-347-enabling-office-365-services/feed/</wfw:commentRss>

		</item>
		<item>
		<title>SQL Server on Linux: Supporting the multi-platform journey</title>
		<link>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/15/sql-server-on-linux-supporting-the-multi-platform-journey/</link>
		<comments>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/15/sql-server-on-linux-supporting-the-multi-platform-journey/#comments</comments>
		<pubDate>Fri, 15 Apr 2016 08:30:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Gavin Payne]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Evaluate]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Generalist]]></category>

		<category><![CDATA[VMWare Specialist]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/?p=12591</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[In early March 2016, it was announced that SQL Server will soon run on the Linux operating system. Gavin Payne shares what he thinks this will mean for IT Pros.]]></description>
		<wfw:commentRss>https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/uktechnet/2016/04/15/sql-server-on-linux-supporting-the-multi-platform-journey/feed/</wfw:commentRss>
